title: Homepage Spline 3D Viewer Load and Animation
description: Verify that the homepage loads the Spline 3D viewer correctly and animations run smoothly on supported devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage URL
Check that the Spline 3D viewer component is rendered
Verify that the 3D animations are running without glitches or freezes
Confirm animations match design specifications for transitions and smoothness

title: Responsive Navigation Bar Functionality
description: Ensure the navigation bar is responsive with functional smooth scrolling and mobile menu toggling.

steps.description: Load the website in a desktop viewport
Click on each navigation item
Verify the page scrolls smoothly to the correct section
Resize browser to a mobile viewport
Click the mobile menu toggle to open the menu
Confirm the mobile menu is visible with navigation links
Click a menu link within the mobile menu
Verify smooth scrolling to the correct section and mobile menu closes

title: Contact Form Successful Submission
description: Test that the contact form submits data successfully to the backend API and returns status 201 with valid inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to contact page
Fill in name, email, subject, and message with valid data
Submit the contact form
Validate backend API responds with HTTP status 201
Confirm user sees a success confirmation message

title: Contact Form Validation Error Handling
description: Verify that submitting the contact form with missing or invalid fields results in a validation error and prevents submission.

steps.description: Navigate to contact page
Submit the form with one or more required fields empty
Verify frontend validation prevents submission
Submit the form with invalid email format
Backend API responds with HTTP status 400 and validation error message

title: Contact Form Server Error Handling
description: Ensure that server errors during contact form submission respond with HTTP 500 and appropriate user feedback.

steps.description: Simulate backend server failure for contact form API
Submit contact form with valid data
API responds with HTTP status 500
User sees a generic error message indicating submission failure

title: Admin Authentication Success
description: Verify successful admin login using NextAuth.js credentials provider and secure session management.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page
Enter valid admin username and password
Submit login form
User is redirected to the admin dashboard
Session token is securely stored and API routes are accessible

title: Admin Authentication Failure Handling
description: Verify that invalid admin login attempts are rejected with proper error messages and no session is created.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page
Enter invalid username and/or password
Submit login form
Access is denied with a descriptive error message
No session token is created and protected admin routes are inaccessible

title: Admin Dashboard Overview Accuracy
description: Verify that the admin dashboard displays accurate and up-to-date statistics and recent activity information.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to the dashboard
Overview statistics match current database data
Recent activity logs display correct and latest actions
Quick action shortcuts function as expected

title: CRUD Operations on Services with Icon and Gradient Selection
description: Test create, read, update, and delete operations for service items including icon and gradient editing in the admin panel.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to services management page
Create a new service with valid name, description, icon, and gradient selection
New service appears in the list with correct details
Edit the existing service to change icon and gradient
Service updates are saved and reflected correctly
Delete a service
Service is removed from the list and database

title: Portfolio Management CRUD With Category Filters
description: Verify CRUD functionality for portfolio projects including image uploads and filtering by categories.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to portfolio management page
Create a new portfolio project with title, description, category, and upload an image
Project is visible in portfolio list with correct details
Filter portfolio list by a specific category
Only projects matching the filter category are displayed
Edit portfolio project details and update image
Changes are saved and visible in the list
Delete a portfolio project
Project is removed from the database and UI

title: Testimonial Management with Rating Function
description: Test CRUD operations for client testimonials including rating input and display.

steps.description: Log in to admin panel and open testimonials management page
Add a new testimonial with client name, details, and rating
Testimonial is saved and visible with correct rating
Update testimonial text and rating
Updates are persisted and displayed correctly
Delete a testimonial
Testimonial no longer appears in the list

title: Admin Content Management for Hero, About, and Contact Sections
description: Verify that admins can edit and save content for hero, about, and contact sections via the admin panel.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to content management page
Edit text and media content for hero section and save
Changes reflect correctly on the live homepage
Edit about section content and save
Updated about information appears properly on public about page
Edit contact section content such as contact info and save
Contact section reflects updates immediately

title: Site Settings Update and Live Appearance Change
description: Test that editing site settings like theme colors, fonts, SEO metadata, and social media links updates live presentation.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to settings page
Change primary theme color, font family, SEO title, and social media URLs
Save the updated site settings
Live site reflects new theme colors and fonts
SEO metadata updates are verifiable via page source
Social media links are updated in site footer or header as appropriate

title: Admin User Role and Permission Enforcement
description: Verify that user roles (admin, editor) enforce proper permission boundaries in the admin panel.

steps.description: Log in as admin user and verify full access to all admin pages and actions
Admin can view and edit user roles including adding editors
Log in as editor user
Editor role cannot access user management page
Editor can perform limited content management actions based on permissions
Attempt unauthorized action as editor (e.g., delete users)
Action is denied with appropriate access error

title: Admin Messages Management and Contact Form Submissions
description: Ensure that the admin messages page displays contact form submissions and allows management actions such as marking as read or deleting.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to messages management page
Recent contact form messages are listed with correct details
Mark a message as read
Message status updates to read and persists
Delete a message from the list
Message is removed from database and UI

title: Protection of Admin Routes and API Endpoints
description: Verify that admin routes and sensitive API endpoints are protected and inaccessible without valid authentication and session tokens.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin dashboard or content pages without authentication
Access is redirected to login page or denied
Make API requests to protected endpoints without valid session token
API responds with 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden
Use valid authentication to access admin pages and APIs
Access granted with proper session verification

title: Security Mechanisms: Password Hashing, CSRF and Rate Limiting
description: Verify that passwords are hashed securely, CSRF tokens protect forms, and rate limiting prevents brute force attempts.

steps.description: Create a new admin user and verify password hash stored in database is not plaintext
Submit forms from admin panel without CSRF token
Form submissions are rejected with CSRF error
Attempt multiple rapid login attempts with wrong credentials
Rate limiting blocks further attempts after threshold is exceeded

title: Performance Benchmark for Homepage Load and Animation Smoothness
description: Test that the homepage meets defined performance benchmarks for load time and animation smoothness on desktop and mobile.

steps.description: Load homepage on desktop device or emulator
Page load time is within acceptable performance threshold (e.g. under 3 seconds)
Observe and measure animation frame rates and smoothness
Animations do not drop frames and transitions are fluid
Repeat tests on mobile device
Performance benchmarks are met on mobile as well
